articles.title: "How did you get this through security?" Pope Leo asks CBS News' Chris Livesay of White Sox baseball bat gift - CBS News
articles.description: As Pope Leo XIV, the first American leader of the Catholic Church, embarked on his first foreign trip, CBS News' Chris Livesay presented the pontiff with a very American family heirloom.
articles.content:
The first-ever American pope's first trip abroad started off with a distinctly American moment, when Pope Leo XIV was gifted a baseball bat formerly owned by Chicago White Sox legend Nellie Fox.
